testInfo.description: Comprehensive test covering quantitative aptitude, English proficiency, and web development concepts including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js

questions.question: A has to pay Rs. 220 to B after 1 year. B asks A to pay Rs. 110 in cash and defer the payment of Rs. 110 for 2 years. A agrees to it. If the rate of interest be 10% per annum in this mode of payment:
options: There is no gain or loss to anyone

questions.question: There are 3 points P, Q and R in a straight line, such that point Q is equidistant from points P and R. A man can swim from point P to R downstream in 48 hours and from Q to P upstream in 32 hours. Find the ratio of speed of man in still water to speed of stream:
In a 1000m race, P beats Q by 100m. Q beats R by 50m in a 500m race. If P beats R by 60 seconds in 2000m race, how long would Q take to travel a distance of 3000m?
If a cyclist starts at 7 km/hr and he increases his speed in every 4 hours by 1 km/hr then the time taken by the cyclist to cover 116 km is?

A can do a piece of work in 24 days, B in 32 days and C in 64 days. Everyone begins to do it together, but A leaves after 6 days and B leaves 9 days before the completion of the work. How many days did the work last?
If a pipe A can fill a tank 3 times faster than pipe B. If both the pipes can fill the tank in 32 minutes, then the slower pipe alone will be able to fill the tank in?
At what time between 9 to 10 will the hands of a watch be together?
Simple interest on a certain amount is 9/25 of the principal. If the numbers representing the rate (p.a. in %) and time (years) are equal, then the time is:

A person invested some money at 12% SI and another amount at 8% SI. He received ₹1000 total interest in a year. If he had interchanged the amounts, he would have received ₹80 more. How much was invested at 12%?

Ranjan purchased 100 tables at ₹120 each. He sold 40 tables at a profit of ₹15 each and 45 tables at a profit of ₹12 each. The remaining tables were sold at a loss of ₹10 each. What is the average profit per table?
A couple has a son and a daughter. Father is 4× the son's age. Daughter is 1/3 of mother's age. Wife is 6 years younger than husband and sister is 3 years older than brother. Mother's age is:

A farmer plans posts at 5 m intervals with posts at both ends. He bought some posts but is 6 short. If he instead spaces them 7 m apart, the posts he bought are exactly enough. Find the side length and how many posts he bought.
A garden has 9 rows and 15 columns of mango trees. Spacing between adjacent trees is 3 m, and there's a 1 m margin on all sides. The length of the garden is:

If ₹420 are divided among 8 men, 10 women and 12 boys such that each man gets an amount equal to one woman and one boy together, and each woman gets twice as much as a boy, then the amount received by all men is:

Cost of 8 pencils, 5 pens and 3 erasers is Rs. 111. Cost of 9 pencils, 6 pens and 5 erasers is Rs. 130. Cost of 16 pencils, 11 pens and 3 erasers is Rs. 221. What is the cost (in Rs) of 39 pencils, 26 pens and 13 erasers?

Previous studies have shown that, since the 1950s, (A) / rates of sea level rise along Atlantic coast of (B) / North America were fast than the global average -- leading (C) / to this region coming to be known as a sea level rise hotspot. (D)

No child growing up in India fails to study the Indus Valley Civilisation, (A) / which is now more popularly referred to the Harappan Civilisation (B) / after Harappa, the first of its site to be excavated (C) / in the 1920s by British archaeologist Sir Mortimer Wheeler. (D)
A few of the technology to reduce emissions from (A) / agriculture and farming, and to optimise feed yields, (B) / are already available but (C) / adoption of the science is lagging. (D)
The end of the Cold War saw India reframe how they (A) / viewed the world, and had left it with (B) / little choice but to deepen its (C) / engagement with the only superpower at the time. (D)

Apart from plugging revenue leakages and reducing the cost (A) / of delays and fuel consumption, which is also lookalike to cut down the nation's GDP loss, (B) / according to the government, the RFID tag helps remove (C) / bottlenecks, ensures seamless moving of traffic and saves time. (D)
INADVERTENT: The company argued the breach was inadvertent and it was unaware of the court order when the automatically generated email went out.
ANTAGONIZE: Canada has decided to not antagonize India in spite of its dismal human rights record.
PAUCITY: A paucity of urea is worrying farmers for the past few days in several states in north India.

Ahead of the (A) maiden budget of his second term in office, Prime Minister (B) brainstormed with top bureaucrats of Finance and other Ministries for (C) ideas to reverse a (D) sagging economy and create jobs.

While steps to (A) enhance investments in manufacturing would be high on (B) agenda, the Modi 2.0 government would also look at steps to (C) address agriculture distress and (D) improve farm income in the upcoming Budget.
Nutritionists have long (A) observed that no one weight-loss (B) strategy works for everyone, and that individuals show (C) striking differences in their responses to different (D) diets.
A hot potato
options: A controversial situation that is awkward to deal with
A situation that is easy to deal with

questions.question: Caught between two stools
options: Caught between two alternatives to choose

questions.question: I. Yellowstone National Park is the oldest national park in the US and likely the world. II. Anyone can drive through the park and encounter an array of wildlife a few feet away.
options: If there is an error only in the first sentence
If there is an error only in the second sentence
If there are errors in both sentences
If there is an error in either of the sentences

questions.question: No matter how sophisticated (1)/ your strategies to rid yourself of (A) / bad habits and create good ones are, (B)/ you're less likelier to succeed if you don't (C)/ track and review you're progress frequently (E).
Which HTTP header is used to prevent clickjacking by restricting framing of a page?
In React, what is the primary benefit of using React.memo()?
options: It delays rendering of a component
It prevents unnecessary re-renders by memoizing output
It forces a re-render on every state update
It converts class components to functional components

questions.question: Which of the following is not a valid HTTP/2 improvement over HTTP/1.1?
In Node.js, which module allows creating a secure HTTPS server?
Which CSS property creates a new stacking context?
What is the main advantage of using a Service Worker in a PWA (Progressive Web App)?
In JavaScript, which of the following is true about Promise.allSettled()?
options: It resolves only when all promises are fulfilled
It rejects if any promise rejects
It returns the results of all promises, regardless of outcome

questions.question: Which of the following is not part of the critical rendering path?
In React, what does the useLayoutEffect hook do differently from useEffect?
options: It runs synchronously before browser paint
It only works on server components

questions.question: In RESTful APIs, which HTTP status code indicates 'Request succeeded but no content returned'?
What is the default scope of CSS variables (--varName) declared in :root?
Which JavaScript feature allows asynchronous, non-blocking I/O in Node.js?
What does 'Hydration' mean in React SSR (Server-Side Rendering)?
options: Merging server-rendered HTML with client-side React DOM
Adding CSS to a pre-rendered page
Rendering the app only on the client

questions.question: In MongoDB, which data structure is used to store documents?
Which of the following HTTP methods is idempotent?
In Webpack, what does the code splitting feature achieve?
options: Splits source code into multiple servers

questions.question: What is the main purpose of key prop in React lists?
options: For uniquely identifying elements during reconciliation

questions.question: Which of the following improves First Contentful Paint (FCP) the most?
What does CORS primarily control in web development?
In Express.js, what does next() do inside a middleware function?
options: Sends the response to the client
Passes control to the next middleware
